This is a NuGet compatible package index.

To use this server, with NuGet, run the following command:

nuget.exe list -Source $source
nuget.exe delete -ApiKey $key -Source $source $pkg $vers
nuget.exe push -ApiKey $key -Source $source $file

This server is running version {{ server_version }} of PyNuGet.

The complete list of packages can be found here.
